ColumnDescription: Number of new hospitalisations from stroke for those aged 75 and above divided by population at the county level  (age-adjusted to the 2000 US standard population and expressed as per 100,000 population in the year)
Average number of stroke hospitalsiations for those aged 75 and above per year over the past 5 years from 2011 to 2015 at the county level
Overall trend in the incidence rate over the past 5 years from 2011 to 2015 at the county level
